reviews.sentence: Good service and would recommend others for business stay as well as family tour. However it would be great if you could provide any time check would be additional advantage.

The restaurant is serving good food and the service is okay welcoming and helpful hotel staff. Internet connection was very poor and for iphone or ipad user it is a little bit tricky connection process. The room is a little bit spoil but okay for sleeping. The restroom was clean but on the walls there was some moist due to humidity. Water from the tap and in the toilet was often getting dark as if it not properly filtered.

Good Service and location. I have stayed for 2 nights and 2 days it was company sponsored on visit to Pune. Nice stay and in good location near by Hinjewadi IT park easily accessible to location. It is easily accessible from Mumbai. Its clean and room service is good. Overall good place to stay. It is a budget hotel and if you book the hotel in advance you will save more.
A good break of journey from Goa to Mumbai. Basic necessities are taken care of clean and decent. The way the payment was taken from my credit card without any intimation to me by Bokingcom.

Lonely and poorly manager hotel. I stayed as my company provided me this hotel due to non availability of TQs. I will try to provide full details First of all location Hotel location is poor and on the highway. No good place restaurant or hangout place nearby Rooms. Rooms are very small dirty and poor window AC which was very old Service. Service is ok. Even i d staff is good I was not given dinner at 105 PM with reason that kitchen closes on 1045. They provided me sandwich which is good but knowing fact that there is no nearby eating place not a goo situation Ambience. Hotel is just ok Free wifi and you will struggle for conectivityI suggest to stay in other hotels nearby.

Some improvements please. This unit needs some attention on upkeep. The wash basin tap was loose. The Internet was dysfunctional for two days. The swing louvers did not work. The management staff are all always pleased and eager to help. All the property needs is a budget for better upkeep. Location is extremely favourable to people who have to work in hinjewadi and Wakad areas and go onwards to Mumbai. the ginger call centre is not very helpful and forthcoming about simple questions that we asked.

OK hotel. Good location but average rooms in this hotel. There is construction work going on that can be troublesome. Food quality is good but not much variety in the menu. Overall it was a good experience and location is very convenient.

Nice room and courteous staff. We stayed only for a night. The room was nice and clean. The staff was courteous and helpful. We had dinner at Ginger restaurant only. Although they took time to deliver the food it was delicious and it felt freshly prepared. Breakfast was also good.

Value for money with all comforts. Good experience. Co operative staff. Located at strategic place wakad. Very well maintained rooms and the ambience is good. Food quality is good but room service menu can be improved. Wi Fi speed can also be improved. Overall a comfortable stay.

Stay at Ginger wakad. The hotel is located right at the end of expressway just beside the road making it convenient for using it as a stopover starting from the check in the front office staff is courteous sagar at the frontdesk was very helpful check in though a bit lengthy was smooth the rooms are worn out every part of the room shows that it needs renovation same can be said about the cleanliness it is not up to the mark having said all this the hotel is worth for the price paid the food is awesome right from Room service to the breakfast very limited 02 main items. the taste quality was up to the mark. Will surely recommend and return.

Good room service nice hotel. Ginger Hotel Pimpri is a nice hotel with good room service. Room with facilities like AC fridge etc. Wi Fi and other facilities are available. The rooms are well maintained and clean. Location of the hotel is very good. it is on the main road and close to railway station.
good service and very good rooms. no connectivity by auto.

Good. Good hotel Service. Just have to say that washroom was not so cleaned. Should add more efforts towards cleanliness of washroom. Everything else was good. Helped a lot spending relaxed weekend. Thank you.
Location is too good if you have work in Wakad and Hinjewadi area. Its bit highly charged but Location wise and Rooms quality wise its a good to stay here.
Decent place good road connectivity.
Loved the service and the breakfast served. Really brand speaks.

Mis Ambiance is very pleasant and the food served is tasty. The staff is very helpful and always attentive in providing services. I am happy with service provided. Thank you for the hospitality. Would suggest to my friends.

Great service room quality. The quality of rooms was very good for the price. The maintenance department was very punctual and responsive for any issue. The food served was of top quality and the was not a bad dish served in our 15 days stay. The restaurant was very properly handled by MAYUR NALU SHEKHAR and HARSHPAL with very good service.
I have liked the hotel. it is centre of the city. rooms are clean and staffs also very suportiveearly check in I have faced isueswaited almost 2 hours in hotel to get room.
Good and decent Hotel is located at prime location. You will get connectivity to Mumbai all other major cities by bus and is a well known point for Travels agency Boarding Drop point.
